// By manrajsingh
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define d1(a)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<"\n";
#define d2(a,b)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<"\n";
#define d3(a,b,c)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<"\n";
#define d4(a,b,c,d)cout<<#a<<": "<<a<<" , "<<#b<<": "<<b<<" , "<<#c<<": "<<c<<" , "<<#d<<": "<<d<<"\n";

struct node{
	ll pos,score;
};

node a[10005];

bool comp(const node& a,const node& b){
	if(a.score>b.score){
		return true;
	}
	else if(a.score==b.score && a.pos<b.pos){
		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

int main() {
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	ll s,m,ans;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
		cin>>s>>m;
		ans=s*m;
		a[i].pos=i+1;
		a[i].score=ans;
	}
	
	sort(a,a+n,comp);
	ll x;
	cin>>m;
	for(int i=0;i<m;i++){
		cin>>x;
		cout<<a[x-1].pos<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
